########################################################################
# Setup library
########################################################################
include(GrPlatform) #define LIB_SUFFIX

list(APPEND gmr1_sources
    ../../src/sdr/dkab.c
    ../../src/sdr/fcch.c
    ../../src/sdr/nb.c
    ../../src/sdr/pi4cxpsk.c
    ../../src/l1/a5.c
    ../../src/l1/bcch.c
    ../../src/l1/ccch.c
    ../../src/l1/conv.c
    ../../src/l1/crc.c
    ../../src/l1/facch3.c
    ../../src/l1/facch9.c
    ../../src/l1/interleave.c
    ../../src/l1/punct.c
    ../../src/l1/rach.c
    ../../src/l1/scramb.c
    ../../src/l1/tch3.c
    ../../src/l1/tch9.c
    ../../src/gsmtap.c
    burst_to_tagged_stream_impl.cc
    gsmtap_sink_impl.cc
    rach_demod_impl.cc
    rach_detect_fft_impl.cc
    rach_file_sink_impl.cc
)

set(gmr1_sources "${gmr1_sources}" PARENT_SCOPE)
if(NOT gmr1_sources)
    MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ sources... skipping lib/")
    return()
endif(NOT gmr1_sources)

add_library(gnuradio-gmr1 SHARED ${gmr1_sources})
target_link_libraries(gnuradio-gmr1
                    fftw3f::fftw3f
                    ${LIBOSMOCORE_LIBRARIES}
                    ${LIBOSMODSP_LIBRARIES}
                    gnuradio::gnuradio-blocks
                    gnuradio::gnuradio-filter
                    gnuradio::gnuradio-fft
                    gnuradio::gnuradio-runtime)
target_include_directories(gnuradio-gmr1
    PUBLIC $<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../include>
    PUBLIC $<INSTALL_INTERFACE:include>
  )
set_target_properties(gnuradio-gmr1 PROPERTIES DEFINE_SYMBOL "gnuradio_gmr1_EXPORTS")

if(APPLE)
    set_target_properties(gnuradio-gmr1 PROPERTIES
        INSTALL_NAME_DIR "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib"
    )
endif(APPLE)

########################################################################
# Install built library files
########################################################################
include(GrMiscUtils)
GR_LIBRARY_FOO(gnuradio-gmr1)

########################################################################
# Print summary
########################################################################
message(STATUS "Using install prefix: ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}")
message(STATUS "Building for version: ${VERSION} / ${LIBVER}")

########################################################################
# Build and register unit test
########################################################################
find_package(Boost COMPONENTS unit_test_framework)
include(GrTest)

# If your unit tests require special include paths, add them here
#include_directories()
# List all files that contain Boost.UTF unit tests here
list(APPEND test_gmr1_sources
)
# Anything we need to link to for the unit tests go here
list(APPEND GR_TEST_TARGET_DEPS gnuradio-gmr1)

if(NOT test_gmr1_sources)
    MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ unit tests... skipping")
    return()
endif(NOT test_gmr1_sources)

foreach(qa_file ${test_gmr1_sources})
    GR_ADD_CPP_TEST("gmr1_${qa_file}"
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/${qa_file}
    )
endforeach(qa_file)
add_definitions(-DBOOST_TEST_DYN_LINK -DBOOST_TEST_MAIN)
